name: Port Valley [DEMO]
description:
Okay, the game is still in development, but an hour-long demo is available in English and Spanish.

It's an alternative version of one of the three parts of the game: The Delivery Guy plot. 

The puzzles have been simplified and the story has been modified to fit the new length, but it may work as a first taste of Port Valley's mechanics and characters.

Contact and Social Stuff

If for some reason you want to follow the development, you can do it via:

Twitter: www.twitter.com/VisitPortValley
YouTube: Port Valley
Webpage: www.portvalley.org

…

Or… well, you can always leave a comment or send an email to:  

contact@portvalley.org

Any kind of feedback would be extremely welcome.
